featured.text: In 1931, members of the Rotary Clubs of Alberta and Montana suggested joining the two parks as a symbol of peace and friendship between the two countries.

definition.zh_def: 阿爾伯塔省，加拿大的一個省，位於該國西部，以其自然美景和石油產業聞名。
definition.en_def: Alberta is a province in western Canada known for its natural beauty and oil industry.
definition.example: Alberta is famous for its stunning national parks and vast prairies.
